mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.punish_id , a.punish_date , a.report_id , a.punished_id , code_val(a.punish_reason) punish_reason FROM(SELECT punish_id , punish_date , report_id , punished_id , punish_reason FROM punish ORDER BY punish_date DESC) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
